item.description:
By Request:

Jenn, was telling me that they have great appetizer deals daily during happy hour. That sounds good to me. Thanks, Jenn!

The Palm Restaurant is the oldest family-owned white tablecloth restaurant to expand across the United States and still maintain family ownership. Pio Bozzi and John Ganzi`s original New York City steakhouse on
Second Avenue has grown into a thriving empire of over 25 restaurants spanning the continent from Boston to Los Angeles.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Happy Hour and appetizers at The Palms
